query: CREATE TABLE indtoasttest(descr text, cnt int DEFAULT 0, f1 text, f2 text)
expected: CREATE TABLE indtoasttest (descr TEXT, cnt INT DEFAULT 0, f1 TEXT, f2 TEXT)

query: INSERT INTO indtoasttest(descr, f1, f2) VALUES('two-compressed', repeat('1234567890',1000), repeat('1234567890',1000))
expected: INSERT INTO indtoasttest (descr, f1, f2) VALUES ('two-compressed', repeat('1234567890', 1000), repeat('1234567890', 1000))

query: INSERT INTO indtoasttest(descr, f1, f2) VALUES('two-toasted', repeat('1234567890',30000), repeat('1234567890',50000))
expected: INSERT INTO indtoasttest (descr, f1, f2) VALUES ('two-toasted', repeat('1234567890', 30000), repeat('1234567890', 50000))

query: INSERT INTO indtoasttest(descr, f1, f2) VALUES('one-compressed,one-null', NULL, repeat('1234567890',1000))
expected: INSERT INTO indtoasttest (descr, f1, f2) VALUES ('one-compressed,one-null', NULL, repeat('1234567890', 1000))

query: INSERT INTO indtoasttest(descr, f1, f2) VALUES('one-toasted,one-null', NULL, repeat('1234567890',50000))
expected: INSERT INTO indtoasttest (descr, f1, f2) VALUES ('one-toasted,one-null', NULL, repeat('1234567890', 50000))
SELECT descr, substring(CAST(make_tuple_indirect(indtoasttest) AS TEXT), 1, 200) FROM indtoasttest

query: UPDATE indtoasttest SET cnt = cnt +1 RETURNING substring(indtoasttest::text, 1, 200)
expected: UPDATE indtoasttest SET cnt = cnt + 1 RETURNING substring(CAST(indtoasttest AS TEXT), 1, 200)

query: UPDATE indtoasttest SET cnt = cnt +1, f1 = f1 RETURNING substring(indtoasttest::text, 1, 200)
expected: UPDATE indtoasttest SET cnt = cnt + 1, f1 = f1 RETURNING substring(CAST(indtoasttest AS TEXT), 1, 200)

query: UPDATE indtoasttest SET cnt = cnt +1, f1 = f1||'' RETURNING substring(indtoasttest::text, 1, 200)
expected: UPDATE indtoasttest SET cnt = cnt + 1, f1 = f1 || '' RETURNING substring(CAST(indtoasttest AS TEXT), 1, 200)

query: UPDATE indtoasttest SET cnt = cnt +1, f1 = '-'||f1||'-' RETURNING substring(indtoasttest::text, 1, 200)
expected: UPDATE indtoasttest SET cnt = cnt + 1, f1 = '-' || f1 || '-' RETURNING substring(CAST(indtoasttest AS TEXT), 1, 200)
SELECT substring(CAST(indtoasttest AS TEXT), 1, 200) FROM indtoasttest

query: CREATE TRIGGER indtoasttest_update_indirect BEFORE INSERT OR UPDATE ON indtoasttest FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE update_using_indirect()
expected: CREATE TRIGGER indtoasttest_update_indirect BEFORE INSERT OR UPDATE ON indtoasttest FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_using_indirect()

query: INSERT INTO indtoasttest(descr, f1, f2) VALUES('one-toasted,one-null, via indirect', repeat('1234567890',30000), NULL)
expected: INSERT INTO indtoasttest (descr, f1, f2) VALUES ('one-toasted,one-null, via indirect', repeat('1234567890', 30000), NULL)
